about:
About
About
I am an AI-supported Full Stack Developer and current AI/DS student with hands-on experience in building intelligent applications using modern technologies. I have developed projects such as a Habit Tracker mobile app (MERN, Electron.js, Docker), UPI Fraud Detection using Random Forest and MERN stack, and an Eidetic Memory Game with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I also specialize in chatbot integration, API automation, and data scraping using Playwright and Python, along with multiple n8n workflow automations like WhatsApp AI agents, social media content automation, and web form submissions.

 I design and deploy mobile, web, and desktop applications with integrated AI,ML, NLP, chatbots, and automation solutions with help of AI tools.I am passionate about leveraging AI to build scalable, intelligent, and automated applications that solve real-world problems efficiently.
